therapies.name: Shirodhara
therapies.description: A continuous stream of warm herbal oil poured on the forehead to calm the nervous system.

therapies.name: Abhyanga
therapies.description: Full body oil massage to detoxify and rejuvenate the body.

therapies.name: Panchakarma
therapies.description: Deep detox program for cleansing the body from toxins.

therapies.name: Matra vasti
therapies.description: Matra Vasti is a specialized Ayurvedic Panchakarma procedure classified as a type of Sneha Vasti (fat-based enema). It involves the administration of a small, precisely measured quantity (roughly 50â€“120 ml) of warm medicated oil or ghee into the rectum to balance Vata dosha.

therapies.name: Kashaya vasti
therapies.description: Kashaya Vasti is a mode of parenteral drug administration. Parenteral refers to medication which is not administered through the digestive system.

therapies.name: Podi Kizi
therapies.description: Podi Kizi is a traditional Ayurvedic therapy involving a massage with small cotton bundles filled with a heated blend of medicinal herbal powders, salt, and sometimes rice

therapies.name: Nasya
therapies.description: Nasya is an Ayurvedic Panchakarma therapy (detoxification) that involves administering herbal oils, ghee, powders, or juices through the nasal passages to treat disorders above the clavicle (head, nose, throat, ears).

medicines.name: Triphala
medicines.description: Herbal blend used to improve digestion and detoxify the body.

medicines.name: Ashwagandha
medicines.description: Adaptogenic herb to reduce stress and increase energy.

medicines.name: Chyawanprash
medicines.description: Herbal jam to boost immunity and vitality.

visits.notes: Felt very relaxed after the session.
Body felt lighter and more energetic.
